Detailed Description

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum eccDspMemType

Enumerates the values used to represent DSP ECC Memory types.

Enumerator
ECC_DSP_MEM_TYPE_L2 

DSP L2 RAM/Cache ECC Memory Type

ECC_DSP_MEM_TYPE_L1P 

DSP L1P RAM/Cache ECC Memory Type

ECC_DSP_MEM_TYPE_L1D 

DSP L1D RAM/Cache ECC Memory Type

Function Documentation

int32_t ECCDspEnable ( uint32_t  memType,
uint32_t  eccEnable,
uint32_t  timeout 
)

This function enables or disables EDC/ECC for L1P or L2 DSP memories.

Parameters
memTypeDSP ECC memory type. This parameter can take any of following values: ECC_DSP_MEM_TYPE_L2 - DSP L2 ECC/EDC ECC_DSP_MEM_TYPE_L1P - DSP L1P ECC/EDC
eccEnableFlag to indicate whether to enable or disable EDC/ECC. It can take any of the two values: ECC_ENABLE - To enable EDC/ECC ECC_DISABLE - To disable EDC/ECC
timeoutTime to wait for the ECC/EDC to get ENABLED/DISABLED
Returns
STW_SOK on success else STW_EFAIL
int32_t ECCDspGetErrInfo ( uint32_t  memType,
eccDspErrInfo_t *  eccDspInfo 
)

This function reads the details of the ECC errors for a particular DSP memory.

Parameters
memTypeDSP ECC memory type. This parameter can take any of following values: ECC_DSP_MEM_TYPE_L2 - DSP L2 ECC/EDC ECC_DSP_MEM_TYPE_L1P - DSP L1P ECC/EDC
eccDspInfoStructure to hold the details of the ECC/EDC error generated at L1P or L2. Refer eccDspErrInfo_t for which fields apply to L1P and which to L2 and their meaning.
Returns
STW_SOK on success else STW_EFAIL
int32_t ECCDspGetL1DErrInfo ( eccDspL1DErrInfo_t *  eccDspInfo)

This function reads the details of the L1D ECC errors.

Parameters
eccDspInfoStructure to hold the details of the ECC/EDC error generated at L1D. Refer eccDspL1DErrInfo_t for the field details.
Returns
STW_SOK on success else STW_EFAIL
int32_t ECCDspGetL1PTagErrInfo ( eccDspL1PTagErrInfo_t *  eccDspInfo)

This function reads the details of the L1P ECC errors.

Parameters
eccDspInfoStructure to hold the details of the ECC/EDC error generated at L1P Tag. Refer eccDspL1PTagErrInfo_t for the field details.
Returns
STW_SOK on success else STW_EFAIL
int32_t ECCDspGetL2TagErrInfo ( eccDspL2TagErrInfo_t *  eccDspInfo)

This function reads the details of the L2 Tag ECC errors.

Parameters
eccDspInfoStructure to hold the details of the ECC/EDC error generated at L2 Tag. Refer eccDspL2TagErrInfo_t for the field details.
Returns
STW_SOK on success else STW_EFAIL
int32_t ECCDspIntrClrErrStatus ( const eccDspErrStatus_t *  errClr)

This function clears the error status of both L1P and L2 EDC/ECC.

Parameters
errClrHolds the values of which error need to be cleared. Refer eccDspErrStatus_t for more details. A value of 1 is written to fields that need to be cleared and 0 for those that need not be cleared.
Returns
STW_SOK on success else STW_EFAIL
int32_t ECCDspIntrGetErrStatus ( eccDspErrStatus_t *  errStatus)

This function reads the error status of both L1P and L2 EDC/ECC.

Parameters
errStatusHolds the values of which error got set. Refer eccDspErrStatus_t for more details. If the value of any field is read as 1 the corresponding ECC error has occurred.
Returns
STW_SOK on success else STW_EFAIL
int32_t ECCDspL2CfgPrm_init ( eccDspL2CfgPrm_t *  eccDspL2Param)

This function initializes the software structure to configure the DSP L2 ECC L2EDCEN register.

Parameters
eccDspL2ParamPointer to the structure to hold the L2 EDC/ECC configuration. Refer eccDspL2CfgPrm_t for details on the structure fields.
Returns
STW_SOK on success else STW_EFAIL
int32_t ECCDspL2Configure ( const eccDspL2CfgPrm_t *  eccDspL2Param)

This function configures the DSP L2 ECC L2EDCEN register. The function to initialize the structure is ECCDspL2CfgPrm_init.

Parameters
eccDspL2ParamPointer to the structure to hold the L2 ECC/EDC configuration. Refer eccDspL2CfgPrm_t for details on the structure.
Returns
STW_SOK on success else STW_EFAIL
int32_t ECCDspSuspend ( uint32_t  memType,
uint32_t  timeout 
)

This function suspends the EDC/ECC for L1P or L2 DSP memories.

Parameters
memTypeDSP ECC memory type. This parameter can take any of following values: ECC_DSP_MEM_TYPE_L2 - DSP L2 ECC/EDC ECC_DSP_MEM_TYPE_L1P - DSP L1P ECC/EDC
timeoutTime to wait for the ECC/EDC to get SUSPENDED
Returns
STW_SOK on success else STW_EFAIL
